## Testing Simulate function
```{r}
source('sim_func.R')
outsim = sim(5, outcome = 'quadratic', betax = c(1,2), rhox = c(0.9,0.1),
             decomposition = 'nested')
outsim = sim(5, outcome = 'linear', rhox = seq(1,0, by = -1/(5^4-1)),
             decomposition = 'spectral')
```
